cause.description:
One day. One night. One community. Your Relay For Life® is about celebration, remembrance, and hope. By participating, you honor cancer survivors, pay tribute to the lives we've lost to the disease, and raise money to help fight it – all right here in your community. You won't want to miss one moment of this life- and community-affirming event!
If you would like to donate ask me or one of my team members.
Solano Community College in the field - July 20-21, 2007
1. Raise money to end cancer!
2. Social Gathering
3. i need to raise $100 to get the shirt ^_^
cause.mission: Raise money for Cancer Research, and Pay tribute to those diagnosed with cancer.
cause.name: 2007 RFL of Fairfield
